## Installation & Uninstallation 

You Should Know python3, To Understand This Project.

To Install
```python3
  pip install HackerGprat
```

To Uninstall
```python3
  pip uninstall HackerGprat
```

To Upgrade
```python3
  pip install HackerGprat -U
```
